item0.name: Control Ward
item0.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item2.name: The Collector
item2.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
12 Lethality
  • Death and Taxes: Dealing damage that would leave an enemy champion below 5% Health executes them. Champion kills grant an additional 25 gold.

item3.name: Refillable Potion
item3.description: Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

item4.name: Eclipse
item4.description:
55 Attack Damage
18 Lethality
8% Omnivamp

  • Ever Rising Moon: Hitting a champion with 2 separate Attacks or Abilities within 1.5 seconds deals an additional 6% max Health physical damage, grants you 15% Move Speed and a (150 + 40% bonus Attack Damage) Shield (100 + 30% bonus Attack Damage for ranged champions) for 2 seconds (8s cooldown, 16s cooldown for ranged champions).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 4% Armor Penetration

item5.name: Mercury's Treads
item5.description:
25 Magic Resist
45 Move Speed
30% Tenacity

Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item0.name: Mercury's Treads
item0.description:
25 Magic Resist
45 Move Speed
30% Tenacity

Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.

item1.name: Goredrinker
item1.description:
45 Attack Damage
400 Health
20 Ability Haste
150% Base Health Regen

Active - Thirsting Slash: Deal (100% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies. Restore (25% Attack Damage + 8% missing Health) for each champion hit (15s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste).
  • Spite: Gain 1% Attack Damage for each 5% missing Health (max 15%).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

item3.name: Essence Reaver
item3.description:
45 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
20 Ability Haste
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack deals an additional 100% Base Attack Damage + 40% Bonus Attack Damage physical damage On-Hit and restores 40% of that damage as mana (1.5s cooldown).

item4.name: The Collector
item4.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
12 Lethality
  • Death and Taxes: Dealing damage that would leave an enemy champion below 5% Health executes them. Champion kills grant an additional 25 gold.

item5.name: Infinity Edge
item5.description:
70 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
  • Perfection: If you have at least 60% Critical Strike Chance, gain 35% Critical Strike Damage.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item0.name: Doran's Blade
item0.description:
8 Attack Damage
80 Health
  • Warmonger: Gain 2.5% Omnivamp.

    Omnivamp is only 33% effective when dealing area of effect damage or damage through pets.

item1.name: Lord Dominik's Regards
item1.description:
30 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
35% Armor Penetration
  • Giant Slayer: Deal up to 15% bonus physical damage against champions with greater max Health than you.

    Max damage increase reached when Health difference is greater than 2000.

item2.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item2.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item3.description:

item5.name: Edge of Night
item5.description:
50 Attack Damage
10 Lethality
325 Health
  • Annul: Gain a Spell Shield that blocks the next enemy Ability (40s cooldown).

    Item's cooldown is restarted if you take damage before it is completed.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Fleet Footwork
perk0.shortDesc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
perk0.longDesc:
Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack is Energized

Energized attacks heal you for 3 - 60 (+0.3 Bonus AD, +0.2 AP) and grant 20% Move Speed for 1s.

Healing from minions is 20% effective for Ranged Champions.

perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item0.name: Duskblade of Draktharr
item0.description:
60 Attack Damage
18 Lethality
20 Ability Haste
  • Nightstalker: Attacking a champion deals an additional (65 + 25% bonus Attack Damage) physical damage (15s cooldown). If dealt by a Melee champion, this Attack also Slows the target by 99% for 0.25 seconds. When a champion that you have damaged within the last 3 seconds dies, this cooldown is refreshed and you become Invisible for 1.5 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

item1.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item1.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item2.name: Essence Reaver
item2.description:
45 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
20 Ability Haste
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack deals an additional 100% Base Attack Damage + 40% Bonus Attack Damage physical damage On-Hit and restores 40% of that damage as mana (1.5s cooldown).

item3.name: Lord Dominik's Regards
item3.description:
30 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
35% Armor Penetration
  • Giant Slayer: Deal up to 15% bonus physical damage against champions with greater max Health than you.

    Max damage increase reached when Health difference is greater than 2000.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).
